manifest.title: Uptime Kuma
manifest.author: Uptime Kuma Team
manifest.description:
## About

It is a self-hosted monitoring tool like "Uptime Robot".
 
## Feature

* Monitoring uptime for HTTP(s) / TCP / Ping.
* Fancy, Reactive, Fast UI/UX.
* Notifications via Webhook, Telegram, Discord and email (SMTP).
* 20 seconds interval.
manifest.tagline: Self-hosted monitoring tool like Uptime Robot
manifest.changelog:
* Update uptime-kuma to 2.1.0
* [Full Changelog](https://github.com/louislam/uptime-kuma/releases/tag/2.1.0)
* [#​6830](https://github.com/louislam/uptime-kuma/issues/6830) feat(notification): add Jira Service Management as a notification provider (Thanks [@​jankal](https://github.com/jankal))
* [#​6777](https://github.com/louislam/uptime-kuma/issues/6777) feat: add google sheets notification provider (Thanks [@​dharunashokkumar](https://github.com/dharunashokkumar))
* [#​6843](https://github.com/louislam/uptime-kuma/issues/6843) feat(discord): add custom message and format presets for notifications (Thanks [@​epifeny](https://github.com/epifeny))
* [#​6804](https://github.com/louislam/uptime-kuma/issues/6804) feat(ntfy): add custom title and message templates for notifications (Thanks [@​epifeny](https://github.com/epifeny))
* [#​6845](https://github.com/louislam/uptime-kuma/issues/6845) fix: certificate expiry (use Settings.set instead of Settings.setSetting) (Thanks [@​epifeny](https://github.com/epifeny))
* [#​6841](https://github.com/louislam/uptime-kuma/issues/6841) fix: weblate conflict (Thanks [@​Aluisio](https://github.com/Aluisio) [@​AnnAngela](https://github.com/AnnAngela) [@​cyril59310](https://github.com/cyril59310) [@​dodog](https://github.com/dodog) [@​FunNikita](https://github.com/FunNikita) [@​Kf637](https://github.com/Kf637) [@​kurama](https://github.com/kurama) [@​mafen](https://github.com/mafen) [@​michi-onl](https://github.com/michi-onl) [@​MrEddX](https://github.com/MrEddX) [@​pmontp19](https://github.com/pmontp19))
* [#​6835](https://github.com/louislam/uptime-kuma/issues/6835) feat(slack): Add option to include monitor group name in notifications (Thanks [@​dovansy1998](https://github.com/dovansy1998))
* [#​6822](https://github.com/louislam/uptime-kuma/issues/6822) fix: improve monitor list selection behavior (Thanks [@​frozenflux2](https://github.com/frozenflux2))
* [#​6805](https://github.com/louislam/uptime-kuma/issues/6805) fix: RSS pubDate timezone issue with backend test ([#​6422](https://github.com/louislam/uptime-kuma/issues/6422)) (Thanks [@​Aqudi](https://github.com/Aqudi))
* [#​6795](https://github.com/louislam/uptime-kuma/issues/6795) fix: monitor names hidden by tags (Thanks [@​bittoby](https://github.com/bittoby))
manifest.postInstallMessage: On first visit, you will be asked to set up an admin account.
